main.heading: Build a brand and start selling in seconds
main.p: No matter what you sell, Bird Software has everything you need to run your online store.

brand: More than 100+ brands have built their business with Bird Software

start.heading: From startup to enterprise, Bird is built for every type of business.
start.p: Built for all businesses and communities, Bird is the only platform you need to grow your business.

customization.heading: Fully Customizable eCommerce
customization.first: Choose from a variety of store templates to get started. And customize your store to fit your brand.
customization.second: Add unlimited products and variations. And manage your inventory with ease.
customization.third: Gain valuable insights into your customers and products with our analytics tools.
customization.forth: Best in class security to protect your data and your customers.

sales.heading: Start building your online store today.
sales.p: Curious about how Bird can help your business? Get in touch with our team to learn more about our platform and how we can help you grow your business.

Pricing.heading: Pricing
Pricing.p: Simple and transparent pricing plans for all businesses.

offers.desc: Start selling online with a simple and easy to use platform. Create your first store in minutes..
Level up your business with a powerful eCommerce platform. Get access to all the features you need to grow.
For businesses that need more. Get access to all the features you need to grow.
